title: Hannah G. & Dylan on Peter’s Drama, Their Picks, and Wedding Plans
description:
Hannah G. reveals her involvement in Hannah Ann being cast on the show this season and what advice she shared with Hannah Ann before she left to film. Plus, Dylan and Hannah weigh in on the Alayah-Victoria P. drama, why they think the girls this season are “bulldozing” Peter, and their predictions on how it will all end.

Then, the couple shares how wedding planning is going and what life has been like since getting engaged on “Paradise.”

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
